3. Let comments drive significant story changes

1. Each tweet MUST start with @XavierFans2
2. DO NOT mention (@) any other users
3. ONLY mention the users listed above

Time Context:
- Current Season: å†¬å­£
- Time Span: These 4 tweets will cover a week
- Time Note: Content should reflect seasonal changes and time progression

Recent Developments:
- Embracing the winter chill with a new project on the horizon. Excited for the journey ahead!
- Taking a break from coding to admire the snowfall outside. Nature's beauty always brings a sense of calm.
- Received some insightful comments that sparked a fresh perspective. Time to incorporate these ideas into the project.
- As the week comes to an end, progress has been made, ideas have evolved, and I'm one step closer to my vision. Time to recharge for the week ahead.

Current Progress:
Starting a new chapter...

1. Comment suggestions have highest priority
2. Must directly respond to comments
3. Let comments create major turning points

- Each tweet MUST start with @XavierFans2
- DO NOT mention any other users
- Total length of each tweet (including @usernames) must not exceed 280 characters

- Describe specific actions and changes
- Show time continuity
- Do not include specific dates or times
